lead_paragraph: One reader is alarmed by nominees’ denial of climate change. Another notes that some of Donald Trump’s picks are at odds with him on major issues.
snippet: One reader is alarmed by nominees’ denial of climate change. Another notes that some of Donald Trump’s picks are at odds with him on major issues....

headline.main: The Senate Hearings on Donald Trump’s Nominees
headline.print_headline: The Senate Hearings on the Cabinet Nominees
